title: Central Tablelands Autumn Seasonal Update |  A case study on sustainable farming

subtasks: Coordinating family members in farm operations
Implementing sustainable farming practices (e.g., minimum/no-till, ground cover)
Expanding water infrastructure (boars, pipelines, header tank)
Upgrading fencing and water troughs for smaller paddock management
Subdividing grazing areas into smaller paddocks for rotation
Rotational grazing management with water troughs in fence lines
Managing lambing in native grasslands for drought resilience
Converting cropping land to grazing land
Participating in local farming programs and knowledge sharing
